participant_1.background:
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
i write in my spare time.
i like to build things.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
i m a veteran.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy Comic Con, but only when I can wear my favorite hoodie.
I am raising my kids on my own.
i work on wall street.
My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels.
I spend my free time with my child and reading about koalas.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you for asking!
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy reading and spending time with my family.
I like reading too! What are some of your favorite books?
I enjoy suspense novels, and I also like reading about koalas.
Those are both great choices! I've never read a book about koalas, but they are so cute!
They are! I love learning about them.
What else do you enjoy doing for fun?
I also like to go to Comic Con. I love dressing up in my favorite character's costumes.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to Comic Con, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to try to go sometime.
